item.description: This will be my first winter hike ever so I am going to test out my new gear on a nice, short, easy hike up Cardigan Mountain in Orange, NH. The road is closed during the winter so we will have to hike a ways to get to the trailhead. Will most likely need snow shoes and you will definitely want micro spikes. Not sure how often this is hiked during the winter. I am guessing parking will be very limited so I would encourage car pooling if you want to go. While the summit is fairly low in elevation it is open so you may want a face mask.

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: Hike Cardigan Mountain
